description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity of an Android app that displays and manages a list of notes with navigation drawer for categories, a Floating Action Button for creating new notes, and a RecyclerView for listing notes using a custom adapter. It interacts with a ViewModel to observe data changes and handles user interactions such as navigation selection, note editing, and deletion.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity manages the main UI for displaying, filtering, and editing notes, integrating navigation drawer and RecyclerView.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of notes, handling item binding, click and long-press events.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for note item views, binding note data to UI components.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up RecyclerView, observes ViewModel data, and defines FAB click behavior.

methods.name: onNavigationItemSelected
methods.description: Handles navigation drawer item selections to filter notes or open settings.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Closes navigation drawer if open, otherwise performs default back action.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with new list of notes.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object's data to the ViewHolder's UI components.
